message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot, and I'm willing to let it go for $90. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $60 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $75.  That's a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $75, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me at $70?
